Mr Wong retired as a Director and the Group Chief Executive Ofﬁcer on 26 February 2015. but continued to be a director of certain subsidiaries of the Company, primarily M&C REIT Management Limited and MEIC Business Trust Management Limited (until12 February 2016 in each case), managers of the trusts that comprise CDL Hospitality Trusts, and Millennium & Copthorne Hotels New Zealand Limited and CDL Investments New Zealand Limited (until 30 June 2017 in each case).
